text: Sugar Hill is a 1974 American blaxploitation action horror movie directed by Paul Maslansky and starring Charlie Robinson, Marki Bey, Robert Quarry, Zara Cully, Don Pedro Colley, Big Walter Price. American International Pictures had previously experimented blaploitation horrors with Blacula (1972) and its sequel Scream Blacula Scream (1973). ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 action movies Category:1974 horror movies Category:American action movies Category:American horror movies Category:Blaxploitation movies
title: Sugar Hill
